name: compton
desc:
I was frustrated by the low amount of standalone lightweight
compositors. Compton was forked from Dana Jansens fork of xcompmgr
and refactored. I fixed whatever bug I found, and added features I
wanted. Things seem stable, but dont quote me on it. I will most
likely be actively working on this until I get the features I want.
This is also a learning experience for me. That is, Im partially
doing this out of a desire to learn Xlib.
